bibl.title: The State and Production in the Roman Agrarian Economy.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Fiscal policies and land tenure. - Roman legal policy and private land tenure. - State policy and commerce in agricultural products. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: The Roman Agricultural Economy. Organization, Investment, and Production = Oxford Studies on the Roman Economy.

bibl.seg: Dennis Kehoe, The State and Production in the Roman Agrarian Economy.
Alan Bowman & Andrew Wilson (edd.), The Roman Agricultural Economy. Organization, Investment, and Production = Oxford Studies on the Roman Economy (Oxford, 2013) pp. 33-53.
Introduction. - Fiscal policies and land tenure. - Roman legal policy and private land tenure. - State policy and commerce in agricultural products. - Conclusion.
